title: Agents of Chaos trying to understand the Goodness of God - a hermeneutical look at difficult texts
description: In this video I approach the subject of the goodness of God. The bible describes God as good, but many passages seem to describe things that do not seem good. I outline an approach to reading these passages that will be helpful in examining many difficult questions about God and the bible.
